name: Flins
title: Shadowy Lights, Stranger Wights
description: A Lightkeeper of Nod-Krai, guardian of a lighthouse and graveyard on a northern isle. An enigmatic gentleman, cultured and courtly.

normal.1: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a forward spear throw.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Flins summons forth the ancient power concealed within his lamp and switches to his Manifest Flame form. This form has the following characteristics:
1: Flins's Normal and Charged Attacks deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro> that cannot be overridden by other Elemental infusions, and he is unable to perform Plunging Attacks.
His Elemental Skill Ancient Rite: Arcane Light is replaced with the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm.
description.4: Flins summons a flurry of spears in front, dealing AoE Electro DMG and causing his Elemental Burst Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night to be replaced with the special Elemental Burst Thunderous Symphony for the next 6s.
description.5: The base CD of Northland Spearstorm is 6s and will not be affected by other effects.

description.0: Flins unleashes the true power of his lamp, dealing <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> and, after a short delay, dealing 2 instances of middle-phase and 1 instance of final-phase <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro>, all of which are considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
description.1: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional 2 instances of middle-phase Lunar-Charged AoE Electro DMG.
description.3: After using the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm, Flins's Elemental Burst Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night will be replaced with the special Elemental Burst Thunderous Symphony for the next 6s.
description.6: Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> that is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
description.7: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional instance of Lunar-Charged AoE Electro DMG.

description.0: Flins will gain a corresponding buff effect based on the party's Moonsign.
description.2: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged reactions triggered by Flins will deal an additional 20% DMG.

description.0: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 8% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 160.

When a party member triggers an Electro-Charged reaction, it will be converted into the Lunar-Charged reaction, with every 100 ATK that Flins has increasing Lunar-Charged's Base DMG by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 14%.
description.2: Additionally, when Flins is in the party, the party's Moonsign will increase by 1 level.

description.0: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Nod-Krai on the mini-map.
description.1: Additionally, Flins appears to be able to decipher the whispers of the Wild Hunt...

description.0: The basic cooldown of the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm is reduced to 4s.
description.1: Additionally, when party members trigger Lunar-Charged reactions, Flins will recover 8 Elemental Energy. This effect can occur once every 5.5s.

description.0: For the next 6s after using the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm, when Flins's next Normal Attack hits an opponent, it will deal an additional 50% of Flins's ATK as AoE Electro DMG. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
description.1: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: While Flins is on the field, after his Electro attacks hit an opponent, that opponent's Electro RES will be decreased by 25% for 7s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night by 3.

description.1: Additionally, his Ascension Talent "Whispering Flame" is enhanced: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 10% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 220.

description.0: Increases the Level of Ancient Rite: Arcane Light by 3.
The DMG dealt to opponents by Flins's Lunar-Charged reactions is elevated by 35%.
description.1: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: All nearby party members' Lunar-Charged DMG is elevated by 10%.
